forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers with a possible thunderstorm this morning, then variable clouds during the afternoon with still a chance of showers. High 11C. Winds SW at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers and thundershowers likely this morning with a shower or two possible during the afternoon. High 53F. Winds SW at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 100%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy this evening, then becoming cloudy after midnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low 7C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Slight chance of a shower throughout the evening. Low around 45F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain and wind. High 11C. Winds SSE at 30 to 50 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Windy with rain likely. High 52F. Winds SSE at 20 to 30 mph. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall around a half an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Light rain early...then remaining cloudy with showers late. Low 8C. Winds S at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 80%.
forecastday.fcttext: Steady light rain in the evening. Showers continuing late. Low 47F. Winds SSE at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 80%.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Cloudy skies with periods of light rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSE at 15 to 25 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy with occasional light rain in the afternoon. High 58F. Winds SE at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Rain. Low 51F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall around a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies during the evening will give way to cloudy skies overnight. Low near 50F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph.
